column2: Mabel Tolkien]] and her sister May Incledon are received into the Church of Rome, bringing about the wrath and opposition of their strongly Baptist relatives.
25]]''' - [[Friedrich Nietzche]], whose works have been compared to those of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] in scholarly articles, dies.

column1: * '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is admitted into [[King Edward's School]] after passing the entrance exam.
* '''?''' - The Tolkiens move from [[Sarehole]] to [[Moseley]] to be closer to [[Birmingham]] and [[King Edward's School]].
